pr_title: Don't raise issues for non success codes unless at LOW threshold

timeline.message:
Don't raise issues for non success codes unless at LOW threshold

Signed-off-by: Simon Bennetts <psiinon@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyText:
I'm sure this is logically correct but it reads awkwardly. If it can be ignored then continue.
You should remove the nots (!) from the function and break if it's ignorable?
Wouldn't that seem more like ignoring what's ignorable.
timeline.author: kingthorin

replies.bodyText:
I think that would change the way it works and actually stop it working correctly. We dont want to break if the message is ignorable because the time round it might not be.
Happy to change the name, but not really sure what to :/
replies.author: psiinon

timeline.message:
